name: Lights ON (TheBlondeBronze)
description:
You are a leerie, the town gas lamp lighter. You do this routine every night but... something seems different. There is something out there with you.

Your goal is to light all of the gas lamps by going up to them and pressing "E" while also avoiding whatever lurks in the darkness. Press and hold "Shift" to run. The only places you can hide are the few alleyways that are already lit. 

Please fill out this short questionnaire after playing: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1RR6BUQj9NR84YVKmvLGdGctYzcGkLNRljHR7T_T7k1o
Lights ON was made by Andrea Toth for her Advanced Game Design Final Project.
